EmailTemplate.name: Green Circle #2.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.first name:default=}}, You're Virtualization's Best. We Want You.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're invited to join The Green Circle Community <http://bit.ly/1xzzmP9>, a free, online portal for VMTurbo believers to convene, converse, and contribute to the evolution of virtualization management.You are a virtual visionary, one of the best minds in IT, and we want your voice.
In The Green Circle, you'll earn points for every action you take... Blogging, commenting, voting, and breathing. The first 50 members to 1,000 Points will be named Green Circle Founders and honored on the site. Request login credentials now!
<http://bit.ly/1xzzmP9> Join the Circle <http://bit.ly/1xzzmP9> 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
